definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: Hyoid bone and arytenoid cartilages were resected and cricoid cartilage anastomosis with the base of the tongue and submental muscles.
sentences.chinese: 常規切除舌骨將環狀軟骨與舌根及頦下肌肉吻合。

sentences.english: May include meat trimmed from the blade and root portions of the tongue.
sentences.chinese: 可包括從舌葉和舌根部分剔除的肉。

sentences.english: Transversus linguae of lingual muscles are more developed. The gustatory glands are seen in radix linguae .
sentences.chinese: 舌肌的橫紋肌發達，味腺只見於舌根部。

sentences.english: Does an oral appliance reduce palatal flutter and tongue base snoring?
sentences.chinese: 口腔矯治器能減少上齶振顫和舌根鼾症？

sentences.english: To make this, my tongue comes up just a little bit in the back, it kind of fattens up.
sentences.chinese: 發這個音時，舌頭只是在舌根處略微擡起，有些攤平。

definition: tongue/CL:個|个[ge4]/enemy soldier captured for the purpose of extracting information
esophagus/the proper way to eat/food transportation route
lit. lips and teeth (idiom); fig. close partners/interdependent
